Emmanuel Mkono (a mụrụ na 12 Disemba 1989 na Dar es Salaam), nke a maara site na aha egwu ya Nahreel, bụ onye Tanzanian Afro beats / Dancehall na-edekọ egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke The Industry Studios ugbu a
Nahreel bụ onye guzobere na onye otu egwu Navy Kenzo

O mepụtara abọm maka ma lekọta ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ndị na-eti egwu na ndị na-agụ egwu, gụnyere Vanessa Mdee, Joh Makini, Diamond Platnumz, Nikki wa pili, Navy Kenzo, Izzo Biznes, Gnako, K.O, Roma Shrekeezy., A na-eto ya dị ka onye dị mkpa na mgbasa nke rap Bekee na Tanzania.
Nahreel na-etinye mmasị ya na egwu mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ mgbe nna ya zụtara ya piano na onye nkuzi iji kụziere ya otu esi akpọ egwu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na egwu dịka onye na-enyere onye na-emepụta egwu aka na Kama Kawa records na Dar es Salaam
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo afọ abụọ tupu ọ gaa India iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Punjab College
Riz One instrumental ya maka Izzo Bizness, nke e wepụtara n'okpuru MJ Records, mere ka onye na-eti egwu Izzo Biznes bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Tanzania kacha ere ahịa n'afọ 2009

Ngwá ọrụ ahụ mekwara ka Nahreel nata nhọpụta maka nnukwu onyinye na izute nwa nke Onye isi ala nke Republic of Tanzania, Rithiwan Kikwete.  Ọ ka nọ na India n'oge a mana ọchịchọ maka ngwá ọrụ ya dị elu na Tanzania dịka ọtụtụ ndị na-ese hip-hop nwere mmasị iso ya rụọ ọrụ.
N'afọ 2011, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na India wee laghachi Tanzania
O mepụtara egwu olenaole tupu ya esonyere ndị enyi ya abụọ iji guzobe otu egwu Pah One.
Ndepụta nke onyinye ndị Navy Kenzo nwetara
